Pre-Game Insights: The Raptors are 1-3 in Eastern Conference games and 1-3 in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons are second in the Eastern Conference with 35.3 defensive rebounds per game led by Tobias Harris averaging 6.6.
Others: The Raptors average 112.8 points per game, 1.0 more than the 111.8 the Pistons allow.
The Pistons are shooting 46.5% from the field, 1.3% lower than the 47.8% the Raptors' opponents have shot this season.
Top performers include Jakob Poeltl (13.9 points, 11.1 rebounds) for the Raptors and Cade Cunningham (23.8 points, 7.2 rebounds) for the Pistons.

Injuries: Raptors have several key players out, including Kelly Olynyk, Bruce Brown, Immanuel Quickley, Ja'Kobe Walter, and Scottie Barnes. Pistons have Jaden Ivey, Bobi Klintman, Simone Fontecchio, Tim Hardaway Jr., and Ausar Thompson listed as day-to-day or out.
